inputs.remark: 缺少 V2（验配后的 follow up），V3（术前评估），V4（术中术后），V5（CI 激活）。

logic_summary: Reconstructed the visit timeline to include missing intermediate steps.
V2: Added post-reprogramming follow-up (1 month later).
V3: Added pre-operative workup (CT, Vestibular) which was previously merged into V1.
V5: Added activation visit (1 month postsurgery).
V6: Renamed original V2 (6 months post-reactivation) to V6.

value.collective_interpretation: Initial evaluation for reprogramming revealed profound SNHL. The right Hybrid CI provided minimal benefit (10% speech recognition) due to loss of residual hearing. The left Standard CI provided good benefit (76%).

tests.name: Pure-tone audiometry
tests.result_summary: Profound SNHL bilaterally. Right ear measurable at 500-750 Hz (105-110 dB HL); no measurable hearing in left ear.

tests.name: Sound-field Thresholds
tests.result_summary: Right Hybrid CI thresholds 40-95 dB HL; Left Standard CI thresholds 15-30 dB HL.

tests.name: Speech audiometry
tests.result_summary: AzBio in quiet (60 dB SPL): Right CI 10%, Left CI 76%, Bilateral 76%.

value.collective_interpretation: Follow-up 1 month after reprogramming adjustments. Aided thresholds improved, but speech recognition showed no significant change.

tests.name: Sound-field Thresholds
tests.result_summary: Improved to expected levels at 250-3000 Hz. Thresholds at 4000-6000 Hz remained 45 dB HL and 'no response'.

tests.name: Speech audiometry
tests.result_summary: No significant change from initial evaluation.

value.collective_interpretation: Pre-operative workup for reimplantation. CT imaging confirmed good position of right Hybrid leads but revealed an electrode fold-over in the left ear. Vestibular function was normal.

tests.name: CT Scan
tests.result_summary: Right Hybrid leads in good position. Left CI showed electrode fold-over in the ascending limb of the basal turn.

tests.name: Vestibular Assessment
tests.result_summary: Normal vestibular function bilaterally (VNG and CDP).

value.collective_interpretation: Intraoperative and postoperative confirmation of right ear reimplantation.

tests.name: Plain film X-ray
tests.result_summary: Confirmed placement of the full electrode insertion in the right ear.

tests.name: Neural Response Telemetry (NRT)
tests.result_summary: Revealed responses across several electrodes with good morphology.

value.collective_interpretation: Activation of new processor 1 month postsurgery. Patient reported immediate improvement in speech recognition and 'fuller' sound quality.
Follow-up 6 months post-reactivation. The patient demonstrated significant improvement, with right ear performance (92%) surpassing the left ear.

tests.name: Sound-field Thresholds
tests.result_summary: Right CI thresholds improved to 20-25 dB HL.

tests.name: Speech audiometry
tests.result_summary: AzBio in quiet: Right CI 92%, Left CI 68%, Bilateral 96%.
